pledges.title: VR Headset for Education
pledges.description: Revolutionary VR headset designed specifically for educational environments. Features eye-tracking technology, comfortable design for extended use, and comprehensive educational content library.

pledges.title: Smart Home Security System
pledges.description: Advanced smart home security system with AI-powered threat detection, real-time monitoring, and seamless integration with existing home automation systems.

pledges.title: Solar Technology Innovation
pledges.description: Next-generation solar panel technology with improved efficiency and durability. Includes smart energy management system and IoT integration for optimal performance monitoring.
